text: Click here for MO, Specialist & Other Post Details DMHS Moti Daman 2017 – 42 ANM, Basic Health Worker & Other Posts: Administration of Daman & Diu, U.T Directorate of Medical and Health Sciences (DMHS), Community of Health Centre, Moti Daman has advertised a notification for the recruitment of 42 Staff Nurse, Dialysis Technician, State Veterinary Consultant – IDSP, State Consultant (Training), Medical Officer (AYUSH Hospital), Staff Nurse – IDSP, X-Ray Technician, Laboratory Technician, Basic Health Worker (BHW), Consultant/ Programme Officer RKSK, ANM, Pharmacist, Laboratory Assistant – IDSP, TB Health Visitor – RNTCP, Dental Surgeon & Physiotherapist vacancies on short term contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 18-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… DMHS Moti Daman Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 42 Name of the Posts: 1. Staff Nurse: 03 Posts 2. Dialysis Technician: 02 Posts 3. State Veterinary Consultant – IDSP: 01 Post 4. State Consultant (Training): 01 Post 5. Medical Officer (AYUSH Hospital): 01 Post 6. Staff Nurse – IDSP: 02 Posts 7. X-Ray Technician: 02 Posts 8. Laboratory Technician: 01 Post 9. Basic Health Worker (BHW): 10 Posts 10. Consultant/ Programme Officer RKSK: 01 Post 11. ANM: 13 Posts 13. Laboratory Assistant – IDSP: 01 Post 14. TB Health Visitor – RNTCP: 01 Post 15. Dental Surgeon: 01 Post 16. Physiotherapist: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should not exceeding 35 years for S.No-1, 5, 6, 10, 14, 15, 30 years for S.No-2, 7, 8, 45 years for S.No-3, 4, 27 years for S.No-9, 11 to 14 Posts. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess H.S.C. passed, A Grade Certificate in Nursing from a recognized University, have Certificate in Midwifery, be registered with Nursing Council for S.No-1, Diploma in Dialysis Technician. Certificates course in dialysis or Diploma in Nursing for S.No-2, Post Graduation Degree in Veterinary Public Health or Veterinary Epidemiology or Veterinary Medicine or Veterinary Medicine or Veterinary Microbiology for S.No-3, Medical Graduation with Post Graduation Degree/ Diploma for S.No-4, Degree in Ayurveda of a recognized University/ Statutory State Board/ Council faculty of Indian Medicine or equivalent for S.No-5 Posts with adequate experience. For more information refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in prescribed format along with relevant documents to the Office of the Directorate, Medical & Health Services, Daman & Diu – 396220 on or before 18-02-2017. Last Date for receipt of Application: 18-02-2017. For more details like tenure, remuneration, vacancy details, emolument, selection process, age relaxation, Salary and benefits, compensation and other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form DMHS Moti Daman Jobs 2017 – Walk in for MO, Specialist & Other Posts: Administration of Daman & Diu, UT, Directorate of Medical & Health Services (DMHS), Community Health Centre, Moti Daman has invited applications for the recruitment of Specialist, Medical Officer (MO), Hospital Manager, Bio Medical Engineer vacancies on short term contract basis/ visiting basis under DMHS, Rogi Kalyan Samiti & National Health Mission. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 18-02-2017 at 10:00 am. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… DMHS Moti Daman Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 27 Name of the Posts:
